summary:
- **Change in substantial holding**: Tembo Capital Mining Fund II LP and Ndovu Capital X B.V. maintained 1,081,799,892 ordinary shares in Orion Minerals but their voting power decreased from 16.47% to 15.36% due to dilution from a capital raising (191.9m shares issued).  
- **Capital raising impact**: Orion issued 191.9m new shares as part of a capital raising announced on 08/07/2025, diluting existing holdings.
